about_the_game:
In a universe, between the plateaus of light and dark, lies the kingdom of Ephemeria. Take the lead role in an epic journey, full of colourful characters and wondrous locations.

Experience emotional highs and lows as your choices lead to real consequences for the people you meet and the friendships you forge along the way. Your actions will determine the fate of an entire kingdom.

Can you save Ephemeria from the Lich Queen's destructive undead forces?

Enjoy a non-linear storyline where your decisions affect how the story plays out.

  • Will you choose a path of light and righteousness?
  • Or choose a path of darkness and ruthlessness?
  • There are multiple endings, and not all of them are happy

Meet friends and journey together.

  • Form relationships with party members, each with unique skills and abilities
  • Discover each character's backstory
  • Even find romance, if you play your cards right!

Develop your character's strengths

  • Increase your skills by making the right decisions
  • Will you train yourself to become a skilled fighter?
  • Or focus on intellect and magic?
  • Perhaps the subtle art of influencing others is more your thing?

short_description: An interactive fiction role-playing game. With a non-linear story line, your choices determine how the story plays out. Recruit allies to join your party, form relationships with party members, and even find romance. Will you choose a path of light? Or a path of darkness?
